name: phpBB2: Java Integrator Servlet
short_description: phpBB2JavaIntergrator is a basic servlet for intergrating the populair phpBB2 bulletin board into a J2EE web applicaton. The servlet takes care of both intergrating J2EE users with phpBB2 users, as well as giving the ability to surround a J2EE frame.
